Other Restaurant Info Phone: work (212) 333-4488 Website: www.5napkinburger.com Notes: Major Credit Cards Hours: Mon-Fri: 11:30am-12am Sat-Sun: 11am-12am Brunch: Sat-Sun: 11am-4pm Serves: Lunch,

Online Reservations,
Accepts Credit Cards User Reviews
5 Napkin Burger Posted by Perri on 05/11/2011
Pretty good
Very pleasantly surprised; food (had burger special w/goat cheese; they mixed up our order but were very nice in taking the food back to fix. Fries delicious. One problem with the greeter as for some reason she had attitude and acted as though she was Princess Kate Middleton! Otherwise, all was great; enjoyed the cosmos too. 5 Napkin Burger Posted by annonymous on 03/16/2011
Must Try
We were seated sooner than expected. Good customer service. The server was helpful. Love the burger, appetizer and desserts. 5 Napkin Burger Posted by Anonymous on 02/26/2011
Best gluten-free burgers
Although the menu doesn't state this, they can prepare most burgers gluten-free, including a gluten-free bun. I was told the fries are also gluten free and prepared in a dedicated frier. The burgers and fries are excellent, I only wish I knew earlier that they could do gluten-free. 5 Napkin Burger Posted by snowgirl51 on 01/20/2011
My Veggie burger lead to enlightenment
Forget if you eat meat or not. This veggie burger is very unique and worth a try. When I bite into it I get a taste of hazelnuts and it the color of beets (minus the taste of beets). The 5 Napkin Sauce, that goes on top, goes with the burger perfectly. I like this burger on a salad just as much as I do on the bun. I never knew veggie burgers like this existed before. So good. 5 Napkin Burger Posted by Anonymous on 12/27/2010
Great Place Except for 1 time
I have eaten here over 30 times since it opened on the upper west side. The food and service are always great, but, the last time I went there I was exteremely disappointed with how the manager handled a family with kids who were running around and disturbing other customers. 5 Napkin Burger Posted by Anonymous on 12/14/2010
Amazing
Amazing burgers, amazing salads, amazing apps, the best beer on tap [their 5 Napkin Nut Brown Ale]. The food is fresh and amazing. The size of drinks is huge. The service is very good. Just a little loud! A must go! 5 Napkin Burger Posted by deshaz on 11/24/2010
Eat the veggie burger!
I randomly went in with a friend to get a to-go burger because a carnivore friend told me she goes there for the veggie burger. It's made from actual veggies (not soy protein) and doesn't fall apart. It's delicious! We sat at the bar and received our orders fairly promptly (and in brown paper bags). The only problem is finding out where we had to place the order. There were 3 very flustered people at the host station and none of them was able to even respond to me for a few minutes. The first response was a vague point and"over there". The second one was a much clearer"at the bar."
